params.content:
# Linux Command-Line Pipeline Mastery - 180 Task Learning Path

## Stage 1: Basic Plumbing (Tasks 1-36)
- [ ] Task 1-6: Basic command structure and I/O redirection
- [ ] Task 7-12: File descriptors and advanced redirection
- [ ] Task 13-18: Here documents and process substitution
- [ ] Task 19-24: Command chaining and basic pipelines
- [ ] Task 25-30: Error handling and logging
- [ ] Task 31-36: Practical exercises and mini-projects

## Stage 2: Text Processing Mastery (Tasks 37-72)
- [ ] Task 37-42: grep, sed, and awk fundamentals
- [ ] Task 43-48: Advanced text filtering and transformation
- [ ] Task 49-54: Regular expressions deep dive
- [ ] Task 55-60: Text statistics and analysis
- [ ] Task 61-66: Multi-file text processing
- [ ] Task 67-72: Complex text pipeline projects

## Stage 3: System Wizardry (Tasks 73-108)
- [ ] Task 73-78: Process management and monitoring
- [ ] Task 79-84: System information extraction
- [ ] Task 85-90: Log file analysis and parsing
- [ ] Task 91-96: Network diagnostics and monitoring
- [ ] Task 97-102: Performance analysis tools
- [ ] Task 103-108: System automation scripts

## Stage 4: Pipeline Kung Fu (Tasks 109-144)
- [ ] Task 109-114: Advanced pipeline architectures
- [ ] Task 115-120: Parallel processing and xargs
- [ ] Task 121-126: Complex data transformations
- [ ] Task 127-132: Error handling in complex pipelines
- [ ] Task 133-138: Performance optimization techniques
- [ ] Task 139-144: Real-world pipeline projects

## Stage 5: Final Challenge (Tasks 145-180)
- [ ] Task 145-150: Master project planning
- [ ] Task 151-156: Complex system integration
- [ ] Task 157-162: Advanced automation scenarios
- [ ] Task 163-168: Performance benchmarking
- [ ] Task 169-174: Debugging and troubleshooting
- [ ] Task 175-180: Final mastery projects

## Rewards and Achievements
- [ ] Create custom .bashrc with pipeline shortcuts
- [ ] Generate comprehensive cheat sheet
- [ ] Prepare forum invitation materials
- [ ] Create completion certificates
- [ ] Build portfolio of completed projects

## Progress Tracking
- Total Tasks: 180
- Completed: 0
- Current Stage: Stage 1 - Basic Plumbing
- Current Task: Task 1 - Basic command structure

import requests

# Ëé∑Âèñ Hacker News ÁÉ≠Èó®Êñ∞Èóª
response = requests.get('https://hacker-news.firebaseio.com/v0/topstories.json')
top_stories = response.json()

# Ëé∑ÂèñÂâç10Êù°Êñ∞ÈóªËØ¶ÊÉÖ
for story_id in top_stories[:10]:
 story_url = f'https://hacker-news.firebaseio.com/v0/item/{story_id}.json'
 story_response = requests.get(story_url)
 story_data = story_response.json()
 print(f"Title: {story_data['title']}")
 print(f"URL: {story_data.get('url', 'No URL')}")
 print(f"Score: {story_data.get('score', 'N/A')}")
 print('---')

### wait_for
